_meta.llm_purpose: Recipe LLM for refining - creates material processing recipes

values: Creating bronze through ancient metallurgical alloying. Harder than copper, more workable than iron. Rarely produces exceptional quality ingots.
Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat.
Forging steel with frost essence. The metal is cold to touch, always.
Infusing copper with storm essence. Perfect magical conductivity.
Infusing steel with fire essence. The metal burns without being consumed.
Milling ash into planks. Superior shock absorption.
Milling maple wood. Resists warping beautifully.
Processing birch into fine planks. Excellent for detail work.
Processing ebony. The wood absorbs light as you work.
Processing pine into planks. Light, flexible wood.
Refining common copper into uncommon quality. Careful heat and patience.
Refining common iron into uncommon quality. Patient work and precise heat.
Refining epic adamantine into legendary quality. Hardness beyond measurement.
Refining epic copper into legendary quality. Perfect molecular alignment achieved.
Refining epic iron into legendary quality. Transcending conventional limits.
Refining epic mithril into legendary quality. The impossible made real.
Refining epic orichalcum into legendary quality. Ancient metal awakens fully.
Refining epic steel into legendary quality. Perfection crystallized in metal.
Refining legendary etherion into mythical quality. Temporal boundaries dissolve entirely.
Refining legendary mithril into mythical quality. The metal sings in harmonic perfection.
Refining legendary mithril. The metal seems to purify itself, occasionally yielding higher quality ingots.
Refining legendary orichalcum into mythical quality. The ancient metal awakens completely.
Refining metal that exists in multiple states. Reality bends during the process.
Refining rare adamantine into epic quality. Nearly indestructible becomes truly eternal.
Refining rare bronze into epic quality. Surpassing even the legendary smiths of old.
Refining rare copper into epic quality. Approaching theoretical perfection.
Refining rare iron into epic quality. Metal that defies conventional limits.
Refining rare mithril into epic quality. The metal sings as it transforms.
Refining rare steel into epic quality. Months of dedication distilled into perfection.
Refining rare tin into epic quality. Perfect magical conductivity achieved.
Refining the ancient metal. Channels both physical and magical forces.
Refining tin ore into silvery metal. Essential for alloys.
Refining uncommon bronze into rare quality. The ancient alloy perfected.
Refining uncommon copper into rare quality. The grain becomes perfect.
Refining uncommon iron into rare quality. Crystalline structure perfecting.
Refining uncommon steel into rare quality. Perfect crystalline structure.
Refining uncommon tin into rare quality. Silvery sheen becomes mirror-bright.
Sawing ironwood requires special blades. Wood dulls them quickly.
Sawing oak logs into usable planks. Basic carpentry.
Smelting adamantine requires extreme heat and purification techniques. Sometimes yields exceptionally pure ingots.
Smelting iron ore into reliable metal. Backbone of civilization. Crushing the ore first increases yield.
Smelting raw copper into usable ingots. The foundation of metallurgy.
TEST: Refining with EMPTY tags array
TEST: Refining with MULTIPLE bonus process tags (crushing + grinding + purifying + alloying)
TEST: Refining with NO bonus tags (pure smelting)
TEST: Refining with ONLY high-probability tags (grinding 40% + purifying 30%)
TEST: Refining with alloying tag for maximum rarity upgrade (+2 tiers)
Working worldtree wood. It remembers being part of something greater.
Calcining limestone. Creates reactive quicklime - foundation of many processes.
Creating bronze. Copper in core determines base, tin in surrounding modifies to alloy - classic 3:1 ratio creates stronger alloy. T1 allows 1 core + 2 surrounding.
Firing clay to brick. Soft earth becomes hard construction material.
Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat - cylinders resist then yield.
Forging steel with frost. Perpetually cold metal - crystallizing impossible cold.
Infusing copper with storm. Perfect conductivity - arcs jump between shards and metal.
Infusing steel with fire. Metal burns without consumption - crystals seep energy in.
Melting sand to glass. Extreme heat transforms granules to clarity.
Milling ash logs. Dense wood, clean grain - satisfying precision.
Milling legendary ironwood. Dense as metal - cylinders strain against it.
Processing birch. White wood with subtle grain - reveals silver interior.
Processing coal to charcoal. Burns hotter, cleaner - essential for advanced work.
Processing maple logs. Light colored wood with fine grain - quality timber.
Processing pine logs. Soft wood cuts easily - resinous scent fills air.
Processing rare ebony. Black as night, hard as steel - exceptional quality.
Refining ancient metal. Channels physical and magical forces - harmonic resonance.
Refining common copper to uncommon. Four compress into one - structure perfects.
Refining common iron to uncommon. Patient work and precise heat.
Refining common steel to uncommon. Carbon bonds align perfectly.
Refining epic adamantine to legendary. Hardness beyond measurement.
Refining epic copper to legendary. Perfect molecular alignment achieved.
Refining epic iron to legendary. Ultimate iron - theoretically perfect.
Refining epic mithril to legendary. Defies physics completely.
Refining epic orichalcum to legendary. Ancient metal awakens fully.
Refining epic platinum to legendary. Ultimate precious metal perfection.
Refining epic steel to legendary. Perfect steel - master smiths weep.
Refining legendary etherion to mythical. Temporal boundaries dissolve.
Refining legendary mithril to mythical. Metal sings in harmonic perfection.
Refining legendary mithril. Metal purifies itself - cylinders align eagerly.
Refining legendary orichalcum to mythical. Complete awakening achieved.
Refining multidimensional metal. Reality bends - impossible configurations work.
Refining platinum ore. Dense white metal - rarer than gold, harder than steel.
Refining rare adamantine to epic. Nearly indestructible becomes truly eternal.
Refining rare bronze to epic. Surpassing legendary smiths of old.
Refining rare copper to epic. Approaching theoretical perfection.
Refining rare iron to epic. Bonds align with supernatural precision.
Refining rare mithril to epic. Weightless perfection approaches.
Refining rare silver to epic. Magical conductivity maximizes.
Refining rare steel to epic. Edge retention becomes legendary.
Refining rare tin to epic. Perfect magical conductivity achieved.
Refining silver ore. Gleaming white metal - resonates with unseen forces.
Refining tin ore. Essential for alloys - cylinders click with different tone than iron.
Refining uncommon bronze to rare. Ancient alloy perfected.
Refining uncommon copper to rare. Grain becomes perfect - impurities purged.
Refining uncommon gold to rare. Lustrous perfection achieved.
Refining uncommon iron to rare. Crystalline structure perfecting.
Refining uncommon steel to rare. Metal sings as imperfections vanish.
Refining uncommon tin to rare. Silvery sheen becomes mirror-bright.
Sawing oak into planks. Basic carpentry - blade sings as grain splits clean.
Smelting adamantine. Extreme heat required - cylinders groan under strain.
Smelting gold ore. Soft lustrous metal - eternal and untarnishing.
Smelting iron ore. Backbone of civilization - each cylinder reveals metal within stone.
Smelting raw copper. Foundation of metallurgy - heat purifies ore, impurities burn away.
Tanning hide to leather. Curing and treating makes it durable and workable.

metadata.narrative: Refining common iron into uncommon quality. Patient work and precise heat.

_usable_template.narrative: Refining epic adamantine to legendary. Hardness beyond measurement.

_sample_items.narrative: Smelting raw copper. Foundation of metallurgy - heat purifies ore, impurities burn away.
Smelting iron ore. Backbone of civilization - each cylinder reveals metal within stone.
Refining tin ore. Essential for alloys - cylinders click with different tone than iron.
Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat - cylinders resist then yield.
Refining legendary mithril. Metal purifies itself - cylinders align eagerly.
